name: Beyond (itch) (Mikkel Sørensen)
description:
Sometimes you just gotta relax. Sometimes you just gotta be in your own space.

Welcome to BEYOND. The game where you do both.

In BEYOND you will simply just have to parse through the portals to gain more points. as of now there is no objective and I have no clue what to add, so if you have any suggestions please let me know!

support me by watching my streams/youtube and join my discord linked below. Thanks guys!

https://discord.gg/rE3TvQxfAJ
